Gensokyo:PerfectCherryBlossom.NAME: Perfect Cherry Blossom
Gensokyo:PerfectCherryBlossom.FLAVOR: A favor bestowed upon you for befriending a lonely girl.
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you would die, heal to #b10% of your Max HP instead. Whenever you would die, #rkill ALL enemies.

Gensokyo:Mercy.NAME: Mercy
Gensokyo:Mercy.FLAVOR: It is mercy, not justice or courage or even heroism, that alone can defeat evil.

Gensokyo:Justice.NAME: Justice
Gensokyo:Justice.FLAVOR: The dead cannot cry out for justice. It is a duty of the living to do so for them.

Gensokyo:CelestialsFlawlessClothing.NAME: Celestial's Flawless Clothing
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, heal to full HP and add an #rAvatar #rof #rDeath to the current encounter. Only works while in combat and will not trigger if an #rAvatar #rof #rDeath is already present.

Gensokyo:OccultBall.NAME: Occult Ball
Gensokyo:OccultBall.FLAVOR: It is said that if you collect seven of them, they would make your wildest dreams come true.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a random #yUrban #yLegend to your hand. Occasionally find more #yOccult #yBalls.
At the start of combat, choose #b1 of #b2 #yUrban #yLegends to add to your hand. Occasionally find more #yOccult #yBalls.
At the start of combat, choose #b1 of #b3 #yUrban #yLegends to add to your hand. Occasionally find more #yOccult #yBalls.
At the start of combat, add #b3 random upgraded #yUrban #yLegends to your hand.
At the start of combat, choose any #b3 upgraded #yUrban #yLegends to add to your hand.

Gensokyo:LunaticRedEyes.NAME: Lunatic Red Eyes
Gensokyo:LunaticRedEyes.FLAVOR: These eyes have no effect on you. After all, you're already insane.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, apply #b

Gensokyo:PortableGap.NAME: Portable Gap
Gensokyo:PortableGap.FLAVOR: As you stare into the abyss, a thousand eyes stare back at you.
DESCRIPTIONS: You may ignore paths and distances when choosing the next room to travel to. Whenever you use this effect, #rlose #b

Gensokyo:NagashiBinaDoll.NAME: Nagashi-bina Doll
Gensokyo:NagashiBinaDoll.FLAVOR: If you look closely, you can almost see the tendrils of misfortune seeping into the doll.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, #yexhaust a random #pCurse in your hand.

Gensokyo:YoukaiFlower.NAME: Youkai Flower
Gensokyo:YoukaiFlower.FLAVOR: The flower seems to be watching you, always craning its neck to follow you around wherever you are.

Gensokyo:Bombinomicon.NAME: Bombinomicon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add #yThe #yBomb+ with #yRetain and #yExhaust to your hand.

Gensokyo:BookOfSpecters.NAME: Book of Specters
Gensokyo:BookOfSpecters.FLAVOR: A book written by a lonely necromancer who just wanted to make some friends.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b
cards. Discard all #ynon-Attack cards drawn this way.

Gensokyo:UndefinedDarkness.NAME: Undefined Darkness
Gensokyo:UndefinedDarkness.FLAVOR: Fear comes in all shapes and sizes.

Gensokyo:ConquerorOfFear.NAME: Conqueror of Fear
Gensokyo:ConquerorOfFear.FLAVOR: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
DESCRIPTIONS: or more cards in your discard pile, you have an additional #b

Gensokyo:DayTheSeaSplit.NAME: The Day the Sea Split
Gensokyo:DayTheSeaSplit.FLAVOR: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever.

Gensokyo:MosesMiracle.NAME: Moses's Miracle
Gensokyo:MosesMiracle.FLAVOR: "A miracle that parts the sea. Which makes it easy to catch fish, apparently." - The Grimoire of Marisa
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, add a #yMiracle to your hand.

Gensokyo:FoxMask.NAME: Fox Mask
Gensokyo:FoxMask.FLAVOR: A mask for the serious and determined.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yStatus card, draw #b

Gensokyo:SpiderMask.NAME: Spider Mask
Gensokyo:SpiderMask.FLAVOR: A mask for the angry and enraged.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play an #yAttack each turn, apply #b

Gensokyo:MaskOfHope.NAME: Mask of Hope
Gensokyo:MaskOfHope.FLAVOR: A mask for humor and cheer.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you lose HP each combat, gain #b

Gensokyo:DemonMask.NAME: Demon Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you did not play any #ynon-Attack cards this turn, gain #b

Gensokyo:LionMask.NAME: Lion Mask
Gensokyo:LionMask.FLAVOR: A mask for the joyful and delighted.

Gensokyo:RedStar.NAME: Red Star
Gensokyo:RedStar.FLAVOR: An ill omen feared by many.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Max HP is reduced by #b
% for the next boss fight. After, obtain a #yspecial #ycard.

Gensokyo:ChorusOfJoy.NAME: Chorus of Joy
Gensokyo:ChorusOfJoy.FLAVOR: A joyful melody for dispirited times.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain [E] and discard #b

Gensokyo:DirgeOfMelancholy.NAME: Dirge of Melancholy
Gensokyo:DirgeOfMelancholy.FLAVOR: A mournful melody for nostalgic times.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, lose [E] and ALL enemies lose #b

Gensokyo:SongOfSouls.NAME: Song of Souls
Gensokyo:SongOfSouls.FLAVOR: A youthful melody for all of time.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Strike or Defend card, #yexhaust it.

Gensokyo:Companionship.NAME: Companionship
Gensokyo:Companionship.FLAVOR: It's those small moments you end up remembering for the rest of your life.

Gensokyo:EmptyGrave.NAME: Empty Grave
Gensokyo:EmptyGrave.FLAVOR: I am not there. I did not die.

Gensokyo:DualWield.NAME: Dual Wield
Gensokyo:DualWield.FLAVOR:
Rip and tear, a bloody grin. 
 Reap and sow, a horrid din.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your single-target #yAttacks deal damage to ALL enemies.

Gensokyo:MarisaIngredientList.NAME: Ingredient List
Gensokyo:MarisaIngredientList.FLAVOR: A bunch of messy scribbles on a page. Apparently creates something known as the "Improbability Potion".
DESCRIPTIONS: NL 3. Once the first two steps are complete, #gbrew the potion at a #ycampfire.

Gensokyo:MarisaImprobabilityPotion.NAME: Improbability Potion
Gensokyo:MarisaImprobabilityPotion.FLAVOR: It bestows the user with the ability to defy all odds.

Gensokyo:MarisaPhilosophersStone.NAME: Philosopher's Stone
Gensokyo:MarisaPhilosophersStone.FLAVOR: Said to transform lead into gold.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yexhaust a card and add a random card of the #ynext #yrarity to your hand.

Gensokyo:NitoriBomb.NAME: Fervent Star
Gensokyo:NitoriBomb.FLAVOR: Hey...! NL You're just going through the files and looking for stuff you missed, aren't you?
DESCRIPTIONS: When purchased, remove #b%s card from your deck.

Gensokyo:NitoriRandom.NAME: Unknown Invention
Gensokyo:NitoriRandom.FLAVOR: Hey...! NL You're just going through the files and looking for stuff you missed, aren't you?
DESCRIPTIONS: When purchased, gain a random common, uncommon or rare relic.

Gensokyo:NitoriTicket.NAME: Aqua Ticket
DESCRIPTIONS: Items in Nitori's shop cost #b%1$s%% less. NL Gain #b%2$s #yGold. NL Whenever you climb a floor, gain #b%3$s #yGold. NL Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain #b%4$s #yGold.
